change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 70/2017, effective March 1, 2017.

bcl:section.bcl:text: Subject to section 2, commencing in the 1991 taxation year the administration fee allowed to each municipality for the purpose of section 124 (10) of the School Act shall be $2 000 plus 0.1% of the current year school tax amount contained in the notice issued to the municipal collector under section 119 (6) (b) of the School Act.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Administration fee for the 1991 taxation year
bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purpose of the 1991 taxation year, the administration fee allowed to each municipality shall be the greater of

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the amount calculated under section 1, or
0.25% of the amount of 1990 non-residential school tax for the municipality based upon assessed values in place at December 31, 1990.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the School Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 412, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 124 (10)]
